zhao.algorithmMagic.io

类 OutputHDFS

  • java.lang.Object
    • zhao.algorithmMagic.io.OutputHDFS
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, OutputComponent

    public final class OutputHDFS
extends Object
implements OutputComponent
    HDFS 平台数据输出设备类，在该类示例化出来的对象中能够直接将数据输出到HDFS文件系统中。

    HDFS platform data output device class, which can directly output data to the HDFS file system in the instantiated objects of this class.

    作者:
    赵凌宇 2023/4/6 20:01

    • 构造器详细资料

      • OutputHDFS

        public OutputHDFS(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fileSystem,
                  org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path outputPath,
                  String format,
                  char sep)
        参数:
        fileSystem - HDFS 文件系统对象。

        HDFS File System Objects.

        outputPath - HDFS 文件数据输出目录。

        HDFS file data output directory.

        format - HDFS 文件数据输出格式。

        HDFS file data output format.

        sep - 文件数据输出时需要使用的分隔符。

        Delimiters required for file data output.

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        指定者:
        isOpen 在接口中 OutputComponent
        返回:

        If the component has already started, return true here

        指定者:

        参数:
        dataFrame - 需要被输出的数据对象

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes this stream and releases any system resources associated with it. If the stream is already closed then invoking this method has no effect.

        As noted in AutoCloseable.close(), cases where the close may fail require careful attention. It is strongly advised to relinquish the underlying resources and to internally mark the Closeable as closed, prior to throwing the IOException.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 Closeable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 AutoCloseable
